title: Current Shareholding - Juventus Football Club
snippet: As of 7 November 2025 the shareholding structure of Juventus Football Club S.p.A.

title: Juventus FC - Wikipedia
snippet: On 7 October 2025, Juventus announced that its chief executive officer, Maurizio Scanavino, would step down from his position on 7 November 2025, concluding a three-year tenure that began in late 2022 following the resignation of the club’s previous board of directors.

title: Tuttosport claims Andrea Agnelli wants to return to Juventus as majority owner | Black & White & Read All Over
snippet: The report states that current Juventus president Gianluca Ferrero, who took over as president in 2023 following Agnelli’s departure, has been “managing” a potential deal for months.

title: Juventus Owners: Past & Present Ownership Details
snippet: Currently, Exor N.V. is the main owner of Juventus. However, the Agnelli Family is the owner of Exor N.V., as most family members of the Agnelli Family are the stakeholders in Exor, and the company was founded by Giovanni Agnelli.

title: Andrea Agnelli - Wikipedia
snippet: Since becoming chairman, Juventus won nine scudetti in a row, a record in Serie A, including five Coppa Italia titles, of which four in a row since the 2014–15 Coppa Italia, five Supercoppa Italiana titles, and reached two UEFA Champions League finals. Agnelli became the second third-generation member of the Fiat-owner family to be involved with the Italian football club Juventus.
